tp:treatment-sec.p:
Microcheilinella sp.
15 –
Zazzali et al . 2015
: fig.
12m .

USA • 1 complete carapace ; Guadalupe Mountains , West Texas , ‘ McKittrick Canyon’ Member , Bell Canyon Formation , MKCS1 section, sample 4 (GM5); Capitanian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63466
•
1 complete carapace , 3 left valves ; same locality as for preceding but samples 4 (GM5) and 2 (GM6); Capitanian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63471
.

The carapace of this species is subtriangular in lateral view, with large AB and strong overlap of LV on RV, hemi-circular furrows are visible on the medio-anterior and medio-posterior parts of the carapace in both valves.
